message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, but its true worth to you is even greater at $15000. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent investment for you. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its value and my expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with this remarkable product.
